title: total skins bugged? only shows 0 skins
body: I have a plethera of skins on my account but ever since the new skins tab came out in the collection, it has stayed at 0 total skins, while still showing all of the skins i have on my account. I just want to figure out why it says 0, and if rito will please fix this bug, because a few of my friends accounts are experiencing the same issue.

replies.body: Saw this reported a few times, looks to be a bug.  In the meantime, swapping to [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in client settings should fix this.  I hope that helps!
